name: Siren Mobile application
description:
Purpose:

for turtle scientists to search nests and collect data.

User story:

  • As a turtle scientist: I want to be able to easily see turtle nests from my project site

on a map, easily record the one that I am observing and

confirm that this is not a duplicate from a previously

observed nest.

  • Acceptance criteria:
  1. I should log in the app and has options to see my position/turtles' position in the map
  2. I can record the data and analyze the data
  3. I should recognize the data and know that it was not duplicated.



  • As a turtle scientist, I want to be able to

get notification which nest is ready to hatch and go few

days later to excavate and record how many eggs have hatched and how many have not (dead)

  • Acceptance criteria
  1. I want to get notification from the app of nests which are ready for hatching
  2. then I can analyze the hatching data
